actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, to provide for the registration of automobiles at least 25 years old as antiques.

summary.text: Provides for the registration of automobiles at least 25 years old as antiques. (Amends D.C. Code Digest sec. 40-103(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Revenue Act of 1937, to provide for the registration of automobiles at least 25 years old as antiques.
